mapper.select: SELECT article_id AS articleId, group_id AS groupId, sequence_no AS sequenceNo, DATE_FORMAT(posting_date, '%Y-%m-%d')AS postingDate, read_count AS readCount, writer_name AS writerName, password, title FROM Article ORDER BY sequence_no DESC LIMIT #{startRow}, #{endRow}

SELECT article_id AS articleId, group_id AS groupId, sequence_no AS sequenceNo, DATE_FORMAT(posting_date, '%Y-%m-%d')AS postingDate, read_count AS readCount, writer_name AS writerName, password, title, content FROM Article WHERE article_id = #{articleId}

SELECT article_id AS articleId, group_id AS groupId, sequence_no AS sequenceNo, DATE_FORMAT(posting_date, '%Y-%m-%d')AS postingDate, read_count AS readCount, writer_name AS writerName, password, title FROM Article WHERE ${keyField} LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') ORDER BY sequence_no DESC LIMIT #{startRow}, #{endRow}
mapper.update: UPDATE Article SET title = #{title}, writer_name = #{writerName}, password = #{password}, content = #{content}, posting_date = NOW() WHERE article_id = #{articleId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Reply(article_id, writer_name, reg_time, reply_content) VALUES(#{articleId}, #{writerName}, SYSDATE(), #{reply_content})
mapper.select: SELECT reply_seq AS replySeq, article_id AS articleId, writer_name AS writerName, DATE_FORMAT(reg_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') AS regTime, reply FROM Reply WHERE article_id = #{articleId}
